gcci.text: H100 spot pricing dips to $3.34/hr as US-East availability eases, unlocking capex relief for new clusters.

gtpi.text: Input token prices compress to $1.41 per 1M as API price wars and distillation-driven efficiency intensify.

gagl.text: 125 TWh annual load underscores grid strain, prompting nuclear baseload expansion for sustained AI growth.

aipi.text: Consolidation and margin normalization signal maturing fundamentals amid sustainable, capex-backed growth.
